back

weird dream from night of aug 18 weird dream last night
all of the incoming students were living in a big big house, like a dormitory
but it was more like a ski chalet
i was there early

participated in some thing involved with waves and water
but i dropped off before the end.
climbed on the shore
and two monks, one male and one female, the male was young but wise. a young dhalai lhama.
the female told me she thought i might be in danger
but the male say that it was going to be fine

then, i found the girl i liked, a
was walking around with her.
i asked if she wanted to walk around the park. she said no probably worrying i was going to try to initiate something too intimate
but she sat down on some steps
and she held my hand.
we kept walking, started heading back towards someone

she saw a friend at the entrance of the chalet
talked very excitedly.
we were walking back towards her room when she suddenly said she had to return sth to a friend.
she told me to wait because she was going to be back in a few seconds.
she rushed out into the snow and then suddenly all these other people came into the waiting room.
i was pushed back and couldn't see very well.
i didn't see her again and i got really worried
i started following girls i thought were her before i realized it wasn't

and then i walked towards the rooms upstairs
i had been to her room once but forgot where it was exactly
i kept walking around and saw other people
then, i finally gave up and went back to sleep.

i woke up in my suite, galen had come back, john as well, as well as jimmy.

there were other random parts like having breakfast in a weird cafeteria which only sold fried stuff
anant was happily munching on his fried chicken.
even mom had to have some fried chicken cuz she was so hungry.
